titleStmt.title: SII 13.157: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 157. (A.R. No. 122 of 1934.) TIRUPPŌRŪR, CHINGLEPUT TALUK, CHINGLEPUT DISTRICT. ON THE EAST, NORTH AND WEST WALLS OF THE DĒVAYĀNAI-AMMAṆ SHRINE, SUBRAHMAṆYA TEMPLE.

summary.p: The stones containing this inscription are misplaced and some are lost. It seems to register an undertaking given by the mahāsabhā of the village Kāyār alias Kamalanārāyaṇa-chaturvēdimaṅgalam in Kumuḻi-nāḍu, a subdivision of Āmūr-kōṭṭam in Jayaṅkoṇḍaśōḻa-maṇḍalam, to see to the proper maintenance of offerings, worship and lamps in the temple of Subrahmaṇyadēva at Tirupporiyūr in the same nāḍu, with the endowments made by some private individuals of the place. The name Jayaṅkoṇḍaśōḻamaṇḍalam came to be applied to the country evidently after Rājarāja I. Since the alphabet of the inscription is also very late, the record may be assigned to the reign of Rājakēsarivarman Kulōttuṅga-Chōḷa I (M.E.R. 1934, II-15).

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . Irājakecaripaṟmaṟku yāṇṭu 6vatu jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu Āmūrk koṭṭattu kumuḻināṭṭu kāyārāṉa kamalanārāyaṇacaturvetimaṅkalattu mahāsabhaiyom Ikkoṭṭattuk kumuḻināṭṭut tirupporiyūr subrahmaṇyadevarkkup �
nārāyaṇac caturvetimaṅkalattu Uṭuppai kumaranan=ti ca(ṭ)ṭaṅkaviyārum Ikkuṭi bhavajanmakramavittarum māṅkaḷūr Uruttirajaṉmakramavittarum Ivar tampimārum piḷḷaiyārkku vaitta nāḷ 1- kku tiruamutu Arici nā(n)nāḻiyum tirunaṉtāviḷakku 1- ṉṟukku E
kku nāḷ 1- ṉṟukku nellut tūṇippatakkum cālaiyaṭṭuvānukku nellup patakkum Āka nelluk kalamāka nāḷḷoṉṟukku Amutupaṭi Arici nā(ṉ) nāḻiyum tiruviḷakkeṇṇai
ḷi Arccippārvacamey ceytu tarakkaṭavomākavum Itil tiṟampi(ṉ)ṉā(r)ruṇṭākil Uṇṭikaiy yilum paṭṭikaiyyilum kāṭṭāte nicatam paṉṉiraṇṭu kāṇam daṇḍamiṭakkaṭavomāka Oṭṭikkuṭut tom mahāsabhaiyom Itu vi
ṭai ceytār ceyta pāvaṅ koḷvār Itu śrī māheśvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 13.157 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
